CS:GO is an excellent first person shooter with team based strategy. Counter-terrorists have to eliminate the terrorists or defuse the bomb. Terrorists have to plant the bomb at either one of the two bombsites or eliminate the Counter-terrorists. Overall a great game to sit back and play with some friends. 9/10

Also after you hit 1,500 hours you cease to feel any emotion
